actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment considered as adopted: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 405, the respective amendments in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary now printed in each bill is considered adopted.
